description: Returns application health status including Qdrant and LLM connectivity
Upload a document for parsing and indexing into the Qdrant vector database
notes: Returns document_id + total_chunks. Uses Docling for rich docs and raw read for text.

description: Perform semantic vector search over indexed documents
notes: Default limit=5 results. Min similarity score=0.3.

description: One-shot Q&A without streaming or session history
notes: Non-streaming. Returns answer + sources. No session saved.

description: Streaming Q&A with conversation history via Server-Sent Events
notes: SSE events: {type:content/done/error}. Saves messages to PostgreSQL. Auto-generates session title on first message.

description: List all chat sessions ordered by creation date descending
Delete a chat session and all associated messages
Retrieve the full message history for a given session
notes: Messages include: id / session_id / role / content / created_at

description: List all unique documents indexed in the vector database
notes: Deduplicates by document_id across all Qdrant points

description: Delete all vector chunks associated with a document
